matches.text: "A generic schema for foundation documents that works for ANY project type (web apps, CLI tools, libraries, services, mobile apps). Focuses ONLY on WHY (problem) and WHAT (solution), never HOW (implementation)."
"REQUIRED: Problem space (WHY) - captures the problems this project solves"
"Additional problems (can have thousands - use subFoundations for scalability)"
"REQUIRED: Solution space (WHAT) - broad capabilities only (3-7 high-level abilities)"
"High-level capabilities (3-7 recommended). Granular features belong in .feature files."
"OPTIONAL: Hierarchical foundations - references to external sub-foundation documents"
"OPTIONAL: Detailed personas (unlimited allowed, suggest 3-7 as best practice)"
"Problem definition with impact, frequency, and cost ratings"
"High-level capability (WHAT the system does, not HOW)"
